channel.title: Status information
channel.description:
When you log on to some servers there is a a status information thing in the middle top of the screen, usually says
Owner: (owners name) Players online: 12
and so on... its usually in green.
You could see what im talking about here http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,50351.0.html (scroll down to pictures)
if someone could please get me that code, or tut

item.title: Status information
item.dc:creator: @KillerbeeWon KillerbeeWon
item.description:
@KillerbeeWon wrote:

I will look, thanks[br][size=1]Posted on: March 11, 2007, 01:26:41 PM[/size][hr]All he has is

Becoming a ghost when you die
Changing spawn point
Death Platue and Trollheim
Farming Skill
Mod Castle
Working ring of life
Zanaris[br][size=1]Posted on: March 11, 2007, 01:28:27 PM[/size][hr]Can anyone find me the code? I cant see it in tuts.
